title: Short-term holders trigger Bitcoin’s largest sell-off in 18 months with $2B transferred to exchanges
description:
Quick Take The Bitcoin market recently experienced an unprecedented sell-off from short-term holders, defined as investors who have held the digital asset for under 155 days. In the last 18 months, we witnessed the most significant sell-off from short-term holders. Approximately $2 billion in Bitcoin was transferred to exchanges, which could potentially imply liquidation, though […]

The post Short-term holders trigger Bitcoin’s largest sell-off in 18 months with $2B transferred to exchanges appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: El Salvador’s Bitcoin bonds set to launch after gaining regulatory nod
description:
El Salvador’s highly-anticipated Bitcoin bonds have received regulatory approval to launch next year, according to a Dec. 12 post on social media platform X by the Central American country’s National Bitcoin Office (ONBTC). “The Volcano Bond has just received regulatory approval from the Digital Assets Commission (CNAD). We anticipate the bond will be issued during […]

The post El Salvador’s Bitcoin bonds set to launch after gaining regulatory nod appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Nigerian Fintech Flutterwave Secures Money Transfer Licenses in 13 US States
description: The Nigerian fintech unicorn revealed on Dec.7 that it has obtained money transfer licenses in 13 U.S. states. Flutterwave’s partnership with a licensed financial institution also means that it can now serve customers in 29 states in the U.S. Flutterwave CEO suggested that the fintech hopes to expand its footprint in the country by securing […]

title: Coq Inu up 51% in 24 hours and 60,000% since launch

title: Dogecoin’s Rollercoaster Ride: Price Plummets 7% Amidst Musk and Markus Drama
description: Dogecoin (DOGE) faces continued selling pressure, trading down at $0.096 and giving up its ninth position to Avalanche (AVAX) after Monday’s market crash. Key resistance at $0.0959, historically challenging for DOGE, could pose a barrier, but positive indicators like RSI and MACD suggest potential recovery and upward movements toward $0.1000. title: BNB Blasts Off: Binance Coin (BNB) Skyrockets 9% in Lightning-Fast Rally
description: Binance Coin (BNB) is on a bullish ride, having jumped 9% in 24 hours to extend its yearly gains. title: BingX highlights Solana and Ordinals as Top Coins to look out for before the year ends
description:

This move comes amidst a remarkable surge in the value of JITO and a notable increase in Solana price (SOL). title: Bitcoin’s Decline Linked To Exchange Long Positions, Says Adam Cochran
description:
Following the unexpected slump in Bitcoin’s price yesterday, Adam Cochran – a fintech executive and renowned crypto Twitter analyst – took to X (formerly Twitter) to explain what caused the sudden drop.  In the series of tweets, Cochran highlighted that the recent decline was caused by the soar in open interest (OI) across exchanges.
